titles.title: The Best Thing In My Life I Ever Did Do

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The best thing in my life I ever did do,
The best thing in my life I ever did do,
The best thing in my life I ever did do
Was to take off the old robe
And put on the new.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O, the old robe was wrinkled
And tattered and torn.
The new robe was spotless,
Had never been worn.
O the best thing in my life I ever did do
Was to take off the old robe
And put on the new.
